Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at South Shore Drive/75th
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via South Shore, 76th, Coles and 75th due to street blockage near South Shore Drive/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via South Shore, 76th, Coles and 75th due to street blockage near South Shore Drive/75th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Cicero
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Cicero due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Cicero due to a door problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
